text: When Isaac was old and his eyes were so weak that he was almost blind, he called his older son Esau and said to him, “My son!” “Here I am!” Esau replied.

Isaac<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="02009 04994">Since</st><n id="2" /> I <st data-num="02204" class="">am</st> so <st data-num="02204" class="">old</st>, I <st data-num="03808 03045">could</st> <st data-num="04194" class="">die</st> at any <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="06258" class="">Therefore</st>, <st data-num="05375 04994">take</st> your <st data-num="03627" class="">weapons</st>—your <st data-num="08522" class="">quiver</st> and your <st data-num="07198" class="">bow</st>—and <st data-num="03318" class="">go out</st> into the <st data-num="07704" class="">open fields</st> and <st data-num="06679" class="">hunt down</st> some <st data-num="06720" class="">wild game</st><n id="1" /> for me.
Then prepare for me some tasty food, the kind I love, and bring it to me. Then I will eat it so that I may bless you before I die.”
Now Rebekah had been listening while Isaac spoke to his son Esau. When Esau went out to the open fields to hunt down some wild game and bring it back,

<st data-num="07259" class="">Rebekah</st> <st data-num="0559 0559">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> her <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st>, “<st data-num="02009" class="">Look</st>, I <st data-num="08085" class="">overheard</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="01696 0413 0559">tell</st> your <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="06215" class="">Esau</st>,
‘Bring me some wild game and prepare for me some tasty food. Then I will eat it and bless you in the presence of the Lord before I die.’

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> then, my <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>, <st data-num="08085 06963">do exactly</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">what</st> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="06680" class="">tell</st> you!<n id="2" />

<st data-num="01980 04994">Go</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="06629" class="">flock</st> and <st data-num="03947 08033">get</st> me <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> of the <st data-num="02896" class="">best</st> <st data-num="01423" class="">young</st> <st data-num="05795" class="">goats</st>. I’ll <st data-num="06213" class="">prepare</st><n id="1" /> them <st data-num="04303" class="">in a tasty way</st> for your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, just the <st data-num="0834" class="">way</st> he <st data-num="0157" class="">loves</st> them.
Then you will take it to your father. Thus he will eat it and bless you before he dies.”
“But Esau my brother is a hairy man,” Jacob protested to his mother Rebekah, “and I have smooth skin!

My <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="0194" class="">may</st> <st data-num="04959" class="">touch</st> me! Then he’ll <st data-num="05869" class="">think</st> I’<st data-num="01961" class="">m</st> <st data-num="08591" class="">mocking</st> him<n id="1" /> and I’ll <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> a <st data-num="07045" class="">curse</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> myself <st data-num="03808" class="">instead of</st> a <st data-num="01293" class="">blessing</st>.”
So his mother told him, “Any curse against you will fall on me, my son! Just obey me! Go and get them for me!”
So he went and got the goats and brought them to his mother. She prepared some tasty food, just the way his father loved it.

Then <st data-num="07259" class="">Rebekah</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> her <st data-num="01419" class="">older</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="06215" class="">Esau’s</st> <st data-num="02532" class="">best</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> she had <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> her in the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>, and <st data-num="03847" class="">put</st> them <st data-num="03847" class="">on</st> her <st data-num="06996" class="">younger</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st>.

She <st data-num="03847" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="05785" class="">skins</st> of the <st data-num="01423" class="">young</st> <st data-num="05795" class="">goats</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> his <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="02513" class="">smooth part</st> of his <st data-num="06677" class="">neck</st>.
Then she handed the tasty food and the bread she had made to her son Jacob.
He went to his father and said, “My father!” Isaac replied, “Here I am. Which are you, my son?”

<st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, “<st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="06215" class="">Esau</st>, your <st data-num="01060" class="">firstborn</st>. I’ve <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> you <st data-num="01696 0413">told</st> me. <st data-num="04994" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">sit</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">up</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> some of my <st data-num="06718" class="">wild game</st> <st data-num="05668" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">you</st> can <st data-num="01288" class="">bless</st> me.”<n id="2" />
But Isaac asked his son, “How in the world did you find it so quickly, my son?” “Because the Lord your God brought it to me,” he replied.

Then <st data-num="03327" class="">Isaac</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st>, “<st data-num="05066 04994">Come closer</st> so I can <st data-num="04184" class="">touch</st> you,<n id="1" /> my <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>, and know <st data-num="0518 03808">for certain if</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">really</st> are my <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="06215" class="">Esau</st>.”<n id="2" />

So <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="05066" class="">went over</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="03327" class="">Isaac</st>, who <st data-num="04959" class="">felt</st> him and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “The <st data-num="06963" class="">voice</st> is <st data-num="06963 03290">Jacob’s</st>, but the <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st> are <st data-num="03027 06215">Esau’s</st>.”

He did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05234" class="">recognize</st> him <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> his <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> <st data-num="08163" class="">hairy</st>, like his <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="06215" class="">Esau’s</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st>. So Isaac <st data-num="01288" class="">blessed</st> Jacob.<n id="1" />

Then he <st data-num="0559" class="">asked</st>, “Are <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">really</st> my <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="06215" class="">Esau</st>?” “<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> am,” Jacob<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>.

Isaac<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="05066" class="">Bring</st> some of the <st data-num="06718" class="">wild game</st> for me to <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st>, my <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="04616" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="01288" class="">bless</st> you.”<n id="3" /> So Jacob<n id="4" /> <st data-num="05066" class="">brought</st> it to him, and he <st data-num="0398" class="">ate</st> it. He also <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> him <st data-num="03196" class="">wine</st>, and Isaac<n id="5" /> <st data-num="08354" class="">drank</st>.

Then his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="03327" class="">Isaac</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “<st data-num="05066 04994">Come here</st> and <st data-num="05401" class="">kiss</st> me, my <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>.”

So Jacob went over and kissed him. When Isaac caught the scent of his clothing, he blessed him, saying,

“Yes, my son smells

like the scent of an open field

which the Lord has blessed.

May God give you

the dew of the sky

and the richness of the earth,

and plenty of grain and new wine.

May peoples serve you

and nations bow down to you.

You will be lord over your brothers,

and the sons of your mother will bow down to you.

May those who curse you be cursed,

and those who bless you be blessed.”
Isaac had just finished blessing Jacob, and Jacob had scarcely left his father’s presence, when his brother Esau returned from the hunt.

He <st data-num="01571 01931">also</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">prepared</st> some <st data-num="04303" class="">tasty food</st> and <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> it to his <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>. Esau<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="01" class="">him</st>, “My <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, <st data-num="06965" class="">get up</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> some of your <st data-num="01121" class="">son’s</st> <st data-num="06718" class="">wild game</st>. <st data-num="05668" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">you</st> can <st data-num="01288" class="">bless</st> me.”<n id="3" />

His <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> <st data-num="03327" class="">Isaac</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">asked</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> are <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st>?” “<st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> am your <st data-num="01060" class="">firstborn</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>,”<n id="2" /> he <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="06215" class="">Esau</st>!”
Isaac began to shake violently and asked, “Then who else hunted game and brought it to me? I ate all of it just before you arrived, and I blessed him. He will indeed be blessed!”
When Esau heard his father’s words, he wailed loudly and bitterly. He said to his father, “Bless me too, my father!”

But Isaac<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “Your <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> in here <st data-num="04820" class="">deceitfully</st> and <st data-num="03947" class="">took away</st><n id="2" /> your <st data-num="01293" class="">blessing</st>.”

Esau exclaimed, “Jacob is the right name for him! He has tripped me up two times! He took away my birthright, and now, look, he has taken away my blessing!” Then he asked, “Have you not kept back a blessing for me?”
Isaac replied to Esau, “Look! I have made him lord over you. I have made all his relatives his servants and provided him with grain and new wine. What is left that I can do for you, my son?”
Esau said to his father, “Do you have only that one blessing, my father? Bless me too!” Then Esau wept loudly.

So his father Isaac said to him,

“See here, your home will be by the richness of the earth,

and by the dew of the sky above.

You will live by your sword

but you will serve your brother.

When you grow restless,

you will tear off his yoke

from your neck.”
So Esau hated Jacob because of the blessing his father had given to his brother. Esau said privately, “The time of mourning for my father is near; then I will kill my brother Jacob!”
When Rebekah heard what her older son Esau had said, she quickly summoned her younger son Jacob and told him, “Look, your brother Esau is planning to get revenge by killing you.

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> then, my <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>, <st data-num="08085" class="">do</st> <st data-num="06963" class="">what</st> I <st data-num="06963" class="">say</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01272" class="">Run away</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">immediately</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> my <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st> in <st data-num="02771" class="">Haran</st>.

<st data-num="03427" class="">Live</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> him for a <st data-num="0259" class="">little</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">while</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05704 0834">until</st> your <st data-num="0251" class="">brother’s</st> <st data-num="02534" class="">rage</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">subsides</st>.
Stay there until your brother’s anger against you subsides and he forgets what you did to him. Then I’ll send someone to bring you back from there. Why should I lose both of you in one day?”
Then Rebekah said to Isaac, “I am deeply depressed because of the daughters of Heth. If Jacob were to marry one of these daughters of Heth who live in this land, I would want to die!”
